org.icij.datashare.text.indexing

Interface Indexer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIndexer, ElasticsearchIndexer

    public interface Indexer
extends Closeable
    Store and search documents on cluster of index node(s) Created by julien on 6/13/16.

                                Properties properties)
        Instantiate a concrete Indexer reflectively with Indexer.Type Defaults to Indexer.NodeType.LOCAL index node(s)
        Parameters:
        type - the Indexer.Type enum value denoting an Indexer implementation
        properties - the Indexer settings as Properties
        Returns:
        Indexer Optional if instantiation instance if succeeded; empty Optional otherwise
